attributes.action: Honour the mandate which resulted in the Conservatives being elected
attributes.additional_details: Conservative election  Mandate stated we would leave the EU on March 29th 2019 with or without a deal
attributes.background: Conservatives are in power because of their mandate stating to honour the referendum results. Theresa May stressed that she believed no deal was better than a bad deal and she could be trusted to get the UK out of the EU. If the mandate is not honoured they received votes under false pretences.
